mapper.sql: id, name, type, exec_action, keywords, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into trans_strategy_filter (name, type, exec_action, keywords, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{record.execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{record.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into trans_strategy_filter
id,
name,
type,
exec_action,
keywords,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,

mapper.update:
update trans_strategy_filter
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT},
keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update trans_strategy_filter set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from trans_strategy_filter
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by gmt_create desc, id desc
select from trans_strategy_filter where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}
select from trans_strategy_filter where id in (select strategy_id from business_strategy where channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and type in (13,14,15))
